name: Mini Extra Strength Dream Coat Ultra-Moisturizing Anti-frizz Treatment
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A powerful anti-humidity treatment that keeps extremely dry, dehydrated hair and curly and coily hair types silky, glossy, and frizz-free for days..Hair Texture:Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Powerhouse anti-frizz, anti-humidity treatment.Highlighted Ingredients:- Proprietary Anti-Humidity Complex: Prevents frizz, adds shine, and provides heat protection..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The Extra Strength Dream Coat Ultra-Moisturizing Anti-frizz Treatment is a groundbreaking, heat-activated technology that provides powerful humidity-proofing, plus added moisture. It seals the cuticle and locks in moisture to keep extremely dehydrated and curly and coily hair types smooth, sleek, and frizz-resistant, even in the highest humidity..Fragrance Description:This treatment is unscented..
ingredients: -Proprietary Anti-Humidity Complex: Prevents frizz, adds shine, and provides heat protection..-Polymer Blend: Creates anti-humidity sealant and locks in moisture..-Glycerin: Powerful humectant moisturizes to help prevent dryness...Water/Aqua, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, VP/Methacrylamide /Vinyl Imidazole Copolymer, Silicone Quaternium-18, Glycerin, Trideceth-6, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Polyimide-1, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Trideceth-12, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Benzoate, Phenylpropanol, Disodium EDTA, Propanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Requires blow-drying with tension to activate..-Shampoo, condition, and blot dry with towel..-Divide hair into sections..-Spray liberally and evenly on damp (not wet) hair to completely saturate..-Do not apply other styling products while the hair is wet. .-You can apply styling products after completing the blow-dry..-If using straightening iron, heat should not exceed 380°F (190°C).-For best results, use every three to four shampoos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this, I sprayed this on then used the Dyson and it literally held the curl. My hair was soooo voluminous and it looked like heat blowout. I recieved so many compliments and my hair stayed voluminous for 3 full days even after brushing it.

I have this product to my stylist to use on my hair. She folllowed the instructions. Product left my hair stiffened and brittle. I also began to experience extreme breakage within al2 weeks of using. I’m a 4c natural. I don’t think this product is friendly to my hair type & texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Follow the instructions and you will notice a difference! As said on the directions, use this product before blow-dryer heat and not heat from a hair straightener. this works really well when not used as a heat protectant which I initially tried to use it as and it made my hair feel crackly. Use before blow-drying and your hair will be soft and have less frizz while also feeling clean since you will not be able to feel the product on your hair afterwards. I use straight up blow-drying heat initially and then I go in with a precision blow-dry heating attachment to straighten my hair.

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend-worked for me in Hawaii-in ocean
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Naturally curly hair. Live in a very dry climate. Was going to Hawaii (very humid and hair isn’t used to that) Did my hair night before flight. Sprayed a good amount from root to ends in strands about. Then blow dried it with a wet brush. Went to bed. Woke up and curled my hair before leaving for the airport. Arrived in Hawaii. Went to a luau outside where it was very humid. Hair still looked good. The second day we went on a boat tour/snorkel tour and it still stayed frizz free after even getting in the water! I was so shocked! I will definitely be buying again! 1-2 inches rhick.

I show you what my hair normally looks like in the past few week then today after using this product.

I spray all over my hair prepping for blow dry, I also spray on individual parts of hair for straightening and also have wonderful results with my tape in hair extensions.

reviews.review_text: If you have frizzy hair that is easily weighed down, then this is a great frizz buster. It prevents humidity and even drizzle from overtaking your hair. I spray evenly throughout my hair, blow dry and then flat iron to seal. And I have a blowout that lasts up to three days.

reviews.review_text: After just one use my hair is not frizzy and has so much shine!! It doesn’t leave a greasy look or feel and makes my hair feel so much softer! It’s a 10 does help but it’s not as good as this color wow!! Im obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This DID NOT work for me at all my hair lasted less than 12 hours before it reverted for NO REASON. I attached a picture of my hair when she finished styling vs. when I woke up the next morning. Yes my hair was wrapped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews but I have to! this actually worked. I followed the instructions and I can't believe how well it worked. the curly pic is my natural texture, the hair down straight is right after I blow dried it (used the Revlon brush) and it lasted for days! I dried it on a Friday and I washed it again the following Wednesday. no touch ups needed!

reviews.review_text: made my hair so soft and shiny using a revair blow-dryer  that usually makes my hair feel rough even with leaves ins. I was worried I'd need leave in but followed the directions. my hair feels amazing hopefully they make this a 16 oz like the regular one. I have kinky 4a/b hair for reference. my hair usually reverts after a day even with other humidity blockers and I'd have to restretch it after . my hair was still stretched from the first time a week later. impressive

reviews.review_text: I really have been enjoying this ultra moisturizing anti frizz spray. I’ve been using it regularly once my hair is styled to keep the fly always in check. Great for coastal weather especially in Florida!

reviews.review_title: On the fence but a nice splurge
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Initially hesitant due to concerns about products weighing down or making hair feel dirty, I decided to try this on my wavy hair, prone to frizz after blow-drying. Applying it to clean, damp hair, the subtle scent was appreciated, although the application could be improved, especially with the smaller bottle's rotating tip. Post-dry, my hair felt pleasantly smooth and soft – not a miraculous transformation, but a decent choice for maintaining well-behaved waves throughout the day. My biggest con is that you have to coat your hair well for it to work and that is definitely pricey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This WOW , Mini Extra Strength Dream Coat Ultra-Moisturizing Anti-frizz Treatment. This treatment helps stop frizz in its tracks and adds need moisture to your hair. I love how soft and silky it feels after use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much! It makes me my hair look so shiny and nice after using it. I definitely recommend in buying it. It’s really small but it really does deserve the hype. My hair has never been better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It worked wonderfully, my hair is wavy so if you have wavy hair let me tell u BUY IT NOW!!! My hair gets usually frizzy in the same day or the next and O M G it didn’t I was so shocked about the results… BUY IT! 🩵

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This treatment is great for my fine, wavy, and very frizzy hair! After using this once, my hair is a lot less frizzy. In fact, it looks healthier and feels stronger than ever. I definitely plan on making this a staple in my hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and this brand, so this did not disappoint! It’s important to follow the instructions with this product in order to get the best results for your hair. If used properly, it seriously is the only product that helps my hair fight the florida humidity. It keeps my hair straight and sleek from wash to wash and nothing on the market compares to this product, and absolute staple in my haircare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one and only product in this WOW line that I actually found some use for. It does smooth out your trouble spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never knew a product like this could even exist! This spray is the ultimate product for curly hair, it really makes silk presses last a much longer time. I did my hair and went walking in the hot sun after and my hair refused to frizz up, I was blown away. I hope they keep making this product forever.

reviews.review_title: A Must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product !!! it works so good and helps my hair look so smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a sweaty girl, I get super hot and humid FAST and my naturally curly hair will frizz up and curl up even when I blow dry/straighten it. THIS STUFF WORKS WONDERS. 8hr work day in AZ doesn’t stand a chance against this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love. Love. Love this product. Follow directions as indicated and it will work! Just ordered myself more. I have thick, coarse, wavy hair and it makes it super smooth and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. When used CORRECTLY, it leaves my hair with silkier shinier smoother strands. I have crazy frizzy hair so when it’s used with my straightener it’s like a whole different head of hair! Don’t use it for air drying this v

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you a curly/coily girl save your money! It does not work. My hair reverted in 2.2 seconds!

reviews.review_title: No better than the regular Dream Coat
reviews.review_text: I've been using the regular Dream Coat for years and I think it's a great blowout spray. I was so excited about this anti-humidity version that I was seeing all over social media. Unfortunately it's exactly the same as the regular dream coat so save your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its too sticky as it dries making it really hard for the brush to pass through. It actually broke off the shark hair brush detachment while mid-pass! Also you have to spray a lot to get the hair saturated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product but i may as well be spraying water to my hair. It made absolutely no difference for me. I tried putting more or less product to see if it would made a difference with no luck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3c curly hair and this product did nothing! I was hoping this would help in Florida summer humidity and that was a total fail within 30 minutes of my *professional* blowout using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute trash. All the claims this product has are lies. My hair got frizzy RIGHT after i finished styling it, i was getting my cheeks clapped in the shower and my hair went back to curly. would rate zero.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product have changed everything I use it on my curls every time I blow dry my hair it helps with the frizz.
Black girls P-L-E-A-S-E don’t waist your money. 0/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this on vacation in Mexico in very high humidity. I have wavy hair that I straighten and normally my hair would become frizzy after five minutes outside. This kept the frizz away all day, even around my face. It was a hair game-changer for me in that climate. It made my vacation pictures so much better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product and it does make a difference if I use it. My hair overall feels refreshed, shiny and soft however I rated it 4 stars because it doesn’t really work with my frizz or humidity. Regardless I’m definitely going to be adding it to my everyday collection

I tried the regular strength one and it didnt work for me so i thought there would be some promise with the extra strength formula. I attended a wedding and during the morning ceremony it was raining so i thought this would hold up but this is what my hair looked like right after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This did not help with frizz 100% which was expected. What’s not good is that when blow drying my hair, this product left a residue in my blow dryer and it oooked nasty. I have natural type 4 hair. Glad I only purchased a mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Results lasted until 4th shampoo.  Use generously.  Works on my fine hair with frizz and gets good results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After going through many different products (high and low end), this is the product that has helped my frizz and dry hair the MOST. For reference, I have bleach blonde hair with a wavy hair texture but I blow dry it straight. Kept my hair frizz free ALL DAY even in humidity/rain. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does not work at all. I tried it a few times, making sure to spray generously and comb through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Mid at best, this does nothing in the Houston or New Orleans humidity. If your curls are reactive to moisture then this will not save you.

reviews.review_title: use as directed for best results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have kinky curly hair and this works for me. It's all about technique. saturate your damp hair with the spray, you need the heat of the blow dryer to activate the product. brush air-dryers do not disperse the enough heat. I go to the gym 5x a week and this helps to reduce me using heat throughout the week.

reviews.review_title: Returned and Bought the Original Formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping that I would love this product as I live the original formula. My hair is medium texture, frizzy, color treated. I dry it and use heat tools. I Hated this product. It made my hair feel awful AND my hair immediately Frizzed! immediately

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product it’s my favorite, fall in love with this product, I really love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t use it after every wash and when I do use it I can see and feel a big difference. It makes my hair sooooo soft. Amazing product. For me the mini size has been lasting a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! The only thing that I don't like is that you have to have wet hair and blow dry to activate. It makes my hair super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the first time I WILL NEVER use it again. While it did keep my hair straight for an entire day which I haven’t achieved before being “natural” it made my hair feel very rough hard and brittle. I had to wash my hair 3x to make it feel normal again and I didn’t even spray that much. I hated how it made my hair feelveryverrough hard and brittle rough

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3a/b hair and I tend to straighten it a lot. This did absolutely nothing for me and still made my hair frizz. Waste of money!

reviews.review_title: ugh it works like a dream

reviews.review_text: it’s a literal dream. it made my hair so soft. softer then it’s ever been. idk why people r dating it 1-3 stars.

reviews.review_text: I had my doubts in the beginning. I have 4C hair and I used this with my normal Kaleidoscope shampoo and the 5 N 1 conditioner. I rinsed my hair out and spray this from root to tip along with my Chi lotion, and ￼blow dried my hair. It came out great with the flat iron that I used too.

reviews.review_title: It’s Okay, but It Doesn’t Last that Long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It could just be me not following directions correctly, but I feel like it doesn’t really “proof” the hair. It’s good for complimenting your straightening, but maybe the extra strength would be better.

reviews.review_title: Not worse the hype, waste of money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know what the hype is about, it’s not doing anything other than making your hair rough , it actually made it worse.. I decided maybe I am doing it wrong. Watched the tutorial how to use. Used it on half of my head and my other half of my head was so much smoother and nicer ( where I didn’t use it).. so the product is total thumbs down, I think ppl on tik tok just market it to get commission, it’s literally not goo, don’t waste your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: super glossy results with impressive humidity protection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It came like half full and leaking. It’s a good product but very dissatisfied with how it arrived and packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty tame 3b hair, this really made it look shiny and feel great, and honestly I was impressed at how long my blow out lasted. I don't know if I would invest in a full size, but the mini lasted me 2 uses and I straighten my hair very rarely, otherwise I'm satisfied :)

reviews.review_title: Now I see why it’s labeled WOW….
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was having trouble this summer sweating and the humidity getting to my hair after just straightening my hair. I was using the Garnier fruit humidity oil, and that wasn’t even working. I am so glad I bought this because this has been the only product that has beat the humidity and the only product that has gotten my hair straighter than usual even when blow drying. I am honestly amazed by this product and will continue to keep buying this. I’m not sure why people are not having the reviews, but this is a holy Grail product. My hair has never been this straight since I went to a salon once. I went into the garage and my hair did not puff up like usual. Usually the next day my hair is very frizzy or curly in the back. There is no sign of either that. I also have 3b/3c type hair.

reviews.review_title: I don’t recommend Believe the reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: For starters my hair is 3A, Followed the instructions showered, sprayed on damp hair in sections, saturated my hair with it, blow dried it (tension), straightened my hair and my hair was just all puffy I had to return it.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my silk press routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Alright girlies, listen up! I’m gonna give you the tea on this product! I was very reluctant to try it based on everybody’s reviews, they’re just all over the place. I have afro-curly (hair typing is stupid but type 4 for your reference). I bought this product specifically for my trip to Atlanta & Savannah Georgia, USA (iykyk). It’s important that you already have a hair care product system  for blowouts/silk presses, if you don’t have that then you’re already going about it wrong. Do your own research to create or buy a line that works for you. After using my line, I went in with Dry Bar’s Liquid Glass Moisture-Rich Miracle Smoothing Sealant, theeeeeen I spray in the Color Wow Dream Coat all over. Think you sprayed enough? Nope, spray again. Enough now? Just a touch more! So yes I use two different anti-humidity sealants to ensure my fro is maintained. It lasted throughout my trip, though I sweated my roots out from playing with my nephew but one pass with flat iron and I was good. Overall, I really like this product and if used correctly, you can have your silk press or blow out even longer than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as someone who has natural 3b type hair, i really wanted this product to work well so i decided to try it out and blow dry/straighten my hair and after 30 mins after application, my hair started to become wavy…. not worth the hype

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin curly hair and this did nothing. I’ve tried both the regular and extra strength. If anything it weighed my hair down without reducing the frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in store this is actually really good for curly hair. I live in Florida everyone knows how bad  the weather is for curly hair

reviews.review_title: Short answer: just another waste of money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are dealing with frizz that your regular hair oil cannot take care of it and you actually need a specific product to tame it you can be sure that this does not work.

reviews.review_title: It works on curly very dry color treated hair.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to revise my review. The first time that I used it, I don’t think I had wet my hair enough. My hair is sleek, soft, and it cut my blow dry with a round brush time in half. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have coily hair - think type 4 - and it worked very well for me! I blowdried my hair and 8 days later, it has not reverted yet. I live in a very humid climate and it has rained many times since.  You have to read the instructions very carefully and saturate your hair with the spray. It will only be activated once it has been blowdried in.   My advice : If you think you've sprayed enough, spray again!!

reviews.review_title: No seal, no cap, no way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No seal, no cap, 1/4 missing. Disappointed is an understatement. This product could essentially be anything. To the trash it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the travel size to try it out and so glad I did. It’s definitely not for me. I have medium, wavy hair and it left residue on my hands and left my hair feeling dirty. I did one half with this and the other half with the regular Cooor WOW and there’s a huge difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used this in the HOT & HUMID weather of Playa Del Carmen and it did not work. Try using the “living proof” anti frizz one instead. That one seemed to work a lot better for me. I have naturally wavy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had sooo many expectations on this product from all the promotion on TikTok but after I bought it I hate it I just expend my money in something that didn’t work at all I have curly hair and I thought I would really work but it was just a scam for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Living in this florida humidity, and having 3c frizzy curly hair, its so difficult for me to find a product that wont frizz up my hair & this worked perfectly. It was my first time buying it & I’ll buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: no difference from the original,, save the extra $2

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have dry bleached hair and I live in a humid area. This product makes my hair look healthy and frizz free!

reviews.review_text: It gave my hair such valuable life I love it so much
